title: Astroship
description: Astroship is a starter template for startups, marketing websites, landing pages & blogs.
fullDescription:
Modern tools

Astroship comes preconfigured with Astro, TailwindCSS, and Alpine.js for a modern developer experience out-of-the-box.

Responsive components

Don’t spend hours reinventing the wheel!  Astroship comes with all the components you need to ship your marketing site fast.

  • Responsive navigation bar with dropdown menus
  • Features section with icons
  • Price comparison cards
  • Contact form

Page layouts

We have created a set of pre-built pages so you start with a fully functional site.

  • Home page with hero section
  • Pricing page
  • About page highlighting your team
  • Blog pages
  • Contact page preconfigured for Web3Forms

image.alt: Astroship is a starter template for startups, marketing websites, landing pages & blogs.

images.alt: Astroship is a starter template for startups, marketing websites, landing pages & blogs.
Astroship is a starter template for startups, marketing websites, landing pages & blogs.
Astroship is a starter template for startups, marketing websites, landing pages & blogs.

title: AstroPaper
description: A minimal, responsive and SEO-friendly Astro blog theme.
fullDescription:
AstroPaper is crafted with best practices and accessibility in mind. If you want a blog with clean design, fully responsiveness, good accessibility (keyboard/VoiceOver navigation, proper landmarks etc), and fast performance, then AstroPaper is for you.

Highly Customizable

AstroPaper is highly customizable - from color schemes, social links to meta tags for SEO. You can customize AstroPaper according to your taste and requirements.

Features

  • Build with TypeScript
  • Fuzzy search with React & FuseJS
  • Accessible out of the box
  • SEO-friendly
  • Light & Dark mode support
  • Includes draft posts & pagination
  • Provides Sitemap & RSS feed

image.alt: A minimal, responsive and SEO-friendly Astro blog theme.

images.alt: A minimal, responsive and SEO-friendly Astro blog theme.
A minimal, responsive and SEO-friendly Astro blog theme.
A minimal, responsive and SEO-friendly Astro blog theme.

title: Odyssey
description: A modern, full-featured theme for a business or startup marketing site.
fullDescription:
Foundation for a Remarkable Website

Odyssey is a modern theme/starter for a business or startup's marketing website. It provides landing page examples, a full-featured blog, contact forms, and more. It is also fully theme-able to match your business' branding and style. It even includes a theme switcher component to show how easily the entire style of the site can be changed with only a few lines of CSS.

  • A Fully-featured blog with tagging
  • Fully theme-able styles for buttons, shpaes, backgrounds, surfaces, etc.
  • Responsive, mobile-friendly landing pages
  • SEO Best Practices (Open Graph, Canonical URLs, sitemap)
  • Performant local fonts setup
  • Contact forms setup for Netlify, Formspree, Formspark, etc.
  • A package of ready-to-use UI components

image.alt: A modern, full-featured theme for a business or startup marketing site.

images.alt: A modern, full-featured theme for a business or startup marketing site.

title: Astro Landing Page
description: An Astro + Tailwind CSS starter kit for landing pages.
fullDescription:
Astro Landing Page is a template project for building a responsive landing page with Astro and Tailwind CSS.

User Experience

Astro Landing Page achieves top scores (100) on PageSpeed Insights in the categories Accessibility, Best Practices & SEO and a near-perfect score for Performance.

It also provides motion-reduce and JavaScript-disabled variants.

Theming

Astro Landing Page uses Tailwind CSS to provide a solid foundation for rapid and versatile styling. On top of that, it also ships a set of CSS variables for defining semantic color names and adding dark mode support.

Responsiveness

Besides adapting its layout to the available viewport, Astro Landing Page also ships with responsive images (via @astrojs/image) and fluid typography.

...And More

Astro Landing Page includes several additional features, such as Open Graph tags for social media sharing, an Astro Prettier setup and easy access to thousands of icons via astro-icon / Iconify.

image.alt: An Astro + Tailwind CSS starter kit for landing pages.

images.alt: An Astro + Tailwind CSS starter kit for landing pages.
An Astro + Tailwind CSS starter kit for landing pages.
An Astro + Tailwind CSS starter kit for landing pages.
An Astro + Tailwind CSS starter kit for landing pages.

title: Accessible Astro Starter
description: An Accessible Starter Theme for Astro including accessiblity features such as landmarks, better focus-outline and skip-links navigation.
fullDescription:
The Accessible Astro Starter is designed to help you build your project faster and provide a solid base for accessibility!

The theme includes some dedicated accessible components (such as a keyboard accessible and responsive navigation) and several components provided by the Accessible Astro Components package.

The theme also includes example pages, a blog with dynamic routes, a custom 404 page and many Design System utility classes, patterns and primitives (such as grids, buttons, lists, spacings, sizes and more).

Accessibility features

  • Semantic HTML and accessible landmarks
  • Outline focus indicator which works on dark and light backgrounds
  • ARIA attributes which provide a better experience for screen reader users
  • Visually hidden "Skip to content" link
  • Navigation menu with full keyboard support and accessible mobile navigation
  • Dark mode support with a user toggle and default support for a user's preferred color scheme
  • Breadcrumbs, pagination, header, and footer components
  • Automatically disables animations for users that have this preference turned on

Extra features

  • SEO Component for setting page-specific metadata
  • Preconfigured with dynamic routes for a basic blog, with breadcrumbs and pagination
  • Custom 404 error page which you can adjust to your needs
  • Accessible Astro Components package comes preinstalled with extra components such as Accordions, Modals and Notifications
  • The Astro Icon package is also preinstalled which can be applied to different use cases

image.alt: An Accessible Starter Theme for Astro including accessiblity features such as landmarks, better focus-outline and skip-links navigation.

images.alt: An Accessible Starter Theme for Astro including accessiblity features such as landmarks, better focus-outline and skip-links navigation.

title: Creek
description: Creek is an open source blog theme for Astro.
fullDescription:
This theme is built upon a theme called Starter's Creek for Statamic CMS. Full design credit goes to Jack McDade.

This theme also take's some ideas and functionality from Ink, another great theme for Astro.

Features

  • Search powered by Lunr.js and Mark.js
  • Sitemap
  • RSS Feed
  • SEO ready. If you are looking for more SEO functionality, check out this Astro SEO Plugin

image.alt: Creek is an open source blog theme for Astro.

title: Blogster Minimal
description: A lightweight, minimal Astro theme that looks great and loads fast.

image.alt: A lightweight, minimal Astro theme that looks great and loads fast.

fullDescription: A light weight theme built with plain old HTML and CSS. No external fonts or icons. Zero JavaScript. You get a full functional nice looking blog that loads super fast.

title: Blogster Sleek
description: A beautiful, performant and accessible theme built with Tailwind.

image.alt: A beautiful, performant and accessible theme built with Tailwind.

fullDescription:
A beautiful, performant and accessible theme built with Tailwind.

  • Sleek. A beautiful Astro theme built with Tailwind.
  • Fast. Fast by default. Blogster templates are engineered to be performant and load before you could blink, even when not cached.
  • Dark mode. Auto dark mode with a manual toggle. Hit that toggle button at the top of the page and see the mode change.
  • Mobile first. Responsive and loads fast in all devices.
  • Accessible. A well thought out semantic and accessible content.
  • Perfect lighthouse score. 100 across the board.
  • Content authoring for everyone. Author content using markdown (.md) from your code editor or directly in GitHub.
  • Extended markdown with Markdoc. Type-safe custom components like YouTube embed, Twitter embed (or anything you want really) in your markdown (.md) files.
  • Built-in RSS feed for you blog, excellent SEO and more.

title: Astrosaas
description: Astrosaas is a template for your next product.
fullDescription:
Built with Astro.js

Astro is an all-in-one web framework for building fast, content-focused websites.

Styled with Tailwind CSS

Tailwind CSS works by scanning all of your HTML files, JavaScript components, and any other templates for class names, generating the corresponding styles and then writing them to a static CSS file.

Relived with Alpine.js

Alpine is a rugged, minimal tool for composing behavior directly in your markup. Think of it like jQuery for the modern web. Plop in a script tag and get going.

Keyboard accessible

Everything I build is keyboard accessible, and I meticulously write the markup to deliver the best screenreader experience I can provide.

Production-ready

I tested the template in the latest versions of all browsers to handle lots of edge-cases you might encounter.

Simple deploys

The template is production-ready and easily deployed anywhere that you can deploy a static wbsites, like Vercel, Netlify, GitHub pages, a bounch of options..


Plugins, integrations and stack.

Supreme templates are thoughtfully crafted with the latest Astro, Tailwind and Alpine.js integrations and versions to keep it simple and easy to maintain.

Uses

  • Tailwind
  • @astrojs/alpinejs
  • @astrojs/seo
  • @astrojs/image
  • @astrojs/compress
  • @astrojs/sitemap
  • @astrojs/partytown

image.alt: Astrosaas is a template for your next product.

title: Pro File
description: Pro File is a website template for a portfolio website that is centered around beautiful imagery.
fullDescription:
A Photography Centric Portfolio Template for Astro

Pro File is a website template for a portfolio website that is centered around beautiful imagery. Some of the features include:

  • A dynamic photo grid on the home page for different sizes of images
  • A contact page with a contact form
  • An about page for the owner/creator
  • Markdown based content
  • Individual pages for each piece of work. (case studies, photo journal entries, blog posts)
  • A category/tag page for each category added to your work
  • Fast performance
  • Custom fonts
  • Responsive Design (mobile, tablet, desktop)

This template would be excellent for a photographer's website, a graphic designer, a UI/UX designer, web designer, travel blogger, and anything in between.

All source code is given under a single purchase, unlimited use license. Meaning you can purchase it once and use it on as many websites as you'd like.
